mapper.delete: delete from album_course WHERE album_id=#{albumId} AND course_id=#{courseId};
mapper.select: SELECT 1 FROM album_course ac LEFT JOIN album a ON ac.album_id=a.album_id WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND course_id=#{courseId} limit 1;

SELECT cc.course_id AS courseId, course_title As courseTitle, course_intro AS courseIntro, course_note AS courseNote, course_cover AS courseCover, course_views AS courseViews, course_collects AS courseCollects, course_likes AS courseLikes, user_id AS userId, diy_label AS diyLabel, cc.update_time AS updateTime, level_id AS levelId FROM course cc LEFT JOIN album_course ac ON cc.course_id=ac.course_id WHERE ac.album_id=#{albumId};
